channel.title: [508] 2 simple things plz help [508]
channel.description:
BTW SOURCE = TEH RULE 12 1. ADDING A BANKER
[[[[ DETAILTS: I CHANGED MY HOME TO BOUNTY I HAVE ALREADY A BANKER THERE BUT IF I TRY TO BANK IM GETTING KICKED ( CONNECTION LOST ) SO I WANNA ADD A NEW BANK PPL SAY I HAVE TO SPAWN BUT IN MY COMMANDS.JAVA THERE IS NO COMMANDS TO SPAWN NPC AND I DONT HAVE NPCSPAWN.CFG SO PLZZ SOMEONE HELP ME WHIT IT ]]]]
2. THE PLACE U ARRIVE WHEN U DIE
[[[[ AFTER CHANGED MY HOME TO BOUNTY I WANT IT STAY AT BOUNTY BUT WHEN YOU DIE YOU TELEPORT TO OLD HOME (CAMELOT) HOW I GONNA FIX THAT? I WANNA CHANGE IT TO SAFE-ZONE IN BOUNTY ]]]]

item.title: [508] 2 simple things plz help [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Tehh, post:6, topic:311047”][quote author=noeb link=topic=407504.msg3010224#msg3010224 date=1256714762]
thnx for helping but
when i search got NPCspawn.cfg nothing show up
and whn i open player.java i cant find anything like applyDead([br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2009, 01:51:52 am[/size][hr]plz somebody help!?!?
[/quote]
Look in “config” folder[/quote]
No…

Its in bin/data/npc/npcspawn.cfg

item.title: [508] 2 simple things plz help [508]
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

mm easy way for ppl like u
login server and get killed,
type ::coords or ::mypos and then take note of those coordinates
then, if u dont have it, search on google for z-filesearcher.jar
then use that to search for the coords in the 508 files and it will locate them in one of the files o.O
change them, then save, compile and ur done

Read full topic

item.title: [508] 2 simple things plz help [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Don’t have Caps lock on…

  1. NPCSpawn.cfg

Add a banker (41-43) to the coordinates of your home.

  1. Player.java

Search for applyDead(
And scroll down until it you find setCoords(, then change the coords in there to the ones you want.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] 2 simple things plz help [508]
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

Please take caps off. That really hurt my eyes.

And if you get dc’ed because you bank, are you talking or use quickly? If a certain one dc’s you, try the other one.

And search for the co-ords of where you die. Then change them.

Read full topic
